description: This nutritious quinoa risotto is slightly nutty and a delicious alternative to traditional risotto.
keywords: Mushroom risotto,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Mushroom,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Mushroom Quinoa Risotto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the leeks for 5 minutes. Add the thyme and mushrooms and cook for 5-6 minutes, stirring all the time. Stir in the garlic and cook for 1 minute.

Stir in the quinoa and cook for 1 minute, pour over the lemon juice and add the stock in 4 stages, stirring until it is absorbed before adding the next ladleful. Cook gently on low heat for 25 minutes until the quinoa is tender.
Stir in the parmesan and a pinch of lemon zest and serve.
